wikipedia_page.main: Henry Noble Shipton (27 June 1797 – 5 December 1821) was a British junior officer who served in the Royal Marines and the Army. He is notable as being the sole Royal Marine to have fought at the Battle of Waterloo.

response: ** Henry Noble Shipton, British junior officer who served in the Royal Marines and the Army (d. 1821)
* 5 December – Henry Noble Shipton, army officer (born 1797)
* 27 June – Henry Noble Shipton, military officer (died 1821)
